Name: Wall-Hearth: "The Firewood that Banishes the Dark"
Desc: A stately fireplace, most elegant and gorgeous, similar to the one used in the House of the Hearth.\nIt is said that some ancient legends hold a hearth to be the symbol of "home," not only providing protection for children at night, but also providing a path to a new life.\nThough... Even if the fire has gone out, the children have now grown strong enough to protect themselves.
